subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: LeBron James returned from a first-half ankle injury to score 26 points and become the youngest player in N.B.A. history to reach the 10,000-point milestone, but the host Boston Celtics defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers, 92-87, on Wednesday night.
snippet: LeBron James returned from a first-half ankle injury to score 26 points and become the youngest player in N.B.A. history to reach the 10,000-point milestone, but the host Boston Celtics defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers, 92-87, on Wednesday night.
